entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move more logic from the Controller.Session down to the SignatureHelpService #73678
  • Cannot define a raw string literal ending in double-quote #73677
  • Automatic line wrapping, taking into account the specified formatting and language syntax. #73671
  • C# needs a feature to "Show all called methods" for any given method implementation. #73669
  • Incorrect receiver capture with `ref C` receiver and interpolation handler #73667
    17.11
  • Option to default the Extract Interface destination to "Add to current file" #73666
  • "Quick Actions and Refactorings" should include suggesting changing the existing declaration to "public" as a proposed fix for error CS0737 #73664
  • CodeLens: References to local functions are not displayed #73663
  • Collection expressions are suggested for types where it doesn't make sense, and their error messages show inconsistent types #73655

Closed

  • Assigning members of ICollection types with collection initializers can provably cause NullReferenceExceptions #73679
  • New syntax related APIs to support "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #73552
  • Delay updating the problem window contents #73665
  • "Remove and Sort Usings" doesn't take care of compiler directive #73662
  • Virtual indentation of multiline text strings. (Editor Feature) #73661
  • Run code clean up -- Can you remove redundant blank lines like CShapier? #73672
  • Shorthand Switch Case Guards #73670
  • Don't build doc-only changes #50261
    Backlog
  • Disable most test jobs in PR builds #57313
    17.6 P2
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34922.180 #73652

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid having to go back to the UI thread in the navbar code #73681
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Convert interval-tree type to a struct #73676
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Generate ISymbol implementations at runtime to avoid type load errors #73675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce cost of syntactic classification by around 25% while paging down through a file (and around 50% while arrowing down). #73673
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix race causing workspace diagnostics to be stale #73653
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Slow down the work navbar does, and cancel updating it when receiving a high volume of user events #73680
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73413
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Expose XAML IDiagnosticSourceProvider names #73674
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Move EnC workspace tests down to Features layer #73660
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Strengthen language version tests for Ref Struct Interfaces #73607
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Add test for F1 on "allows ref struct" #73654
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement ICollection<T> on ArrayBuilder #73659
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Shipping tasks #73617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Adjust receiver in instance invocations #73501
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Return the SignatureHelp items nearest to the cursor #73606
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Use a common mechanism so Taggers access the main thread at the same time. #67259
    Area-IDE
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Always use a by-value temp to capture a reference type receiver #73631
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Partial properties: public API and IDE features #73603
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2459255 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Updated projects #73598
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
